casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Carl Lorice BREWTON No. 252A95-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2019 Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Carl Lorice Brewton, for Brewton, Carl Lorice.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 28th of March 2019 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Buncombe County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2019."

Ervin, J. recused
